column4: Could anyone point me to resources that would help programmers new to hacking Linux on how the cycle works? More specifically, I intend to modify the algorithm used by the window manager to choose windows' placement. Personally, I dislike the one used by default, in spite of it being called "smart placement".
I wanted to know how, after modifying the source I could get that change to take effect on my system.
That would be Metacity, for Gnome.
